CustomField.formula: IF(TEXT(Account.DELTA_Loyalty_Member__r.MemberStatus) = 'Active' && ISPICKVAL(Account.Delta_Loyalty_Tier__c, "Elite"), 150, IF(TEXT(Account.DELTA_Loyalty_Member__r.MemberStatus) = 'Active' && ISPICKVAL(Account.Delta_Loyalty_Tier__c, "Etoile"), 100, IF(TEXT(Account.DELTA_Loyalty_Member__r.MemberStatus) = 'Active' && ISPICKVAL(Account.Delta_Loyalty_Tier__c, "Carte blanche"), 60, IF(TEXT(Account.DELTA_Loyalty_Member__r.MemberStatus) = 'Active' && ISPICKVAL(Account.Delta_Loyalty_Tier__c, "Avantage"), 40, IF(TEXT(Account.DELTA_Loyalty_Member__r.MemberStatus) = 'Active' && ISPICKVAL(Account.Delta_Loyalty_Tier__c, "Classique"), 20, 0)))))
CustomField.label: Loyalty Tier
